      public void updateCard​(ProductionCard newCard, int x, int y, int dashboardPos, int index)
      Called when a new card sis buyed from shop
      Parameters:
      newCard - card to put inside shop
      x - col shop
      y - row shop
      dashboardPos - dash position to update
      index - player who buyed

    • isLoaded

      public boolean isLoaded()
      Returns:
      true if model is loadel 100% (to avoid to do model access before its loaded)

    • setModelObserver

      public void setModelObserver​(BasicSceneUpdater currScene)
      This minimodel has only ONE observer at time so this function change it if needed
      Parameters:
      currScene - current scene that observe

    • setPlayers

      public void setPlayers​(MiniPlayer[] players)
      used by server to generate Minimodel, Set a miniplayer
      Parameters:
      players - array of miniplayer generated by server

    • getPlayers

      deposits - new deposit recived from server
      index - player which recived update
